name: daktilo
description: Turn your keyboard into a typewriter! ðŸ“‡
readme_summary: The daktilo repository provides a command-line program written in Rust that emulates typewriter sounds upon keyboard key presses. It allows users to customize the keypress sounds using built-in sound presets, offering a fun and nostalgic typing experience.
key_features: Typewriter sound emulation on keypress
Customizable sound presets
Command-line interface
Support for various platforms
primary_use_case: Enhancing the typing experience with typewriter sound effects.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a cozy study where a vintage typewriter sits beside a modern computer. A person is typing on the computer, but instead of the usual clicks, the distinct sounds of a typewriter emanate from the keyboard. Ghostly typewriter keys appear briefly above the computer keyboard with each press. A small UI element on the computer screen displays the 'daktilo' application. The scene is bathed in warm, nostalgic lighting. Subtle digital particles float around the keyboard, connecting the old and new technologies. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and a comforting color scheme.

name: gamewiki
description: An intelligent Wiki overlay tool designed specifically for gamers, featuring GEMINI-powered RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) capabilities for smart Q&A services.
readme_summary: GameWiki is an AI-powered in-game assistant that provides real-time wiki overlay and AI knowledge base for instant answers while gaming. It leverages Google's Gemini API and local knowledge bases to offer smart Q&A services without requiring users to alt-tab out of their games.
key_features: One hotkey access (Ctrl+Q) to wiki/AI chat overlay
AI Game Expert powered by Google Gemini
Support for AI-enhanced and Wiki-supported games
Customizable hotkeys and settings
primary_use_case: Providing gamers with instant access to game information and AI-powered assistance without leaving the game.
cover_image_prompt: A scholar wearing gaming headset sits at a desk overflowing with books and game guides. A holographic screen overlays the scene, displaying game information and an AI chatbot interface. The scholar types a question, and the AI responds with helpful information that appears as glowing text overlaid on the game guides. The scene is set in a cozy, slightly cluttered study with warm lighting. Small UI elements and code snippets are subtly incorporated into the holographic screen. The repository name, 'GameWiki,' is subtly displayed on a book spine. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: reddit2shorts
description: Make youtube shorts from reddit posts
readme_summary: The `reddit2shorts` repository provides a tool to automatically create YouTube Shorts from Reddit posts. It leverages text-to-speech (TTS) to generate audio from post content and comments, combines it with background video and audio, and optionally uploads the result to YouTube or TikTok.
key_features: Generates YouTube Shorts from Reddit posts
Uses text-to-speech (TTS) for audio narration
Supports random post selection or specific post ID
Allows customization of comments count, TTS engine, background audio/video, and tags
Offers upload functionality to YouTube and TikTok
primary_use_case: Automated creation of short-form video content for platforms like YouTube and TikTok using Reddit posts as source material.
cover_image_prompt: A diligent robot meticulously sifting through a mountain of Reddit posts, selecting the most captivating stories. The chosen posts are then fed into a magical machine that transforms them into vibrant, engaging video shorts, complete with animated text and background music. Miniature screens display snippets of Reddit threads and the resulting short videos. The scene is set in a futuristic content creation studio bathed in soft, digital light. Small UI elements show the `reddit2shorts` logo. The composition is clean and focused, with a vibrant color scheme. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: gonzo
description: Gonzo! The Go based TUI log analysis tool

name: filestash
description: :file_folder: The Dropbox like web client for SFTP, S3, FTP, WebDAV, Git, Minio, LDAP, CalDAV, CardDAV, Mysql, Backblaze, ...
readme_summary: Filestash is a web-based file manager that provides a Dropbox-like interface for accessing and managing files across various storage backends. It supports protocols like SFTP, S3, WebDAV, Git, and more, offering a unified way to interact with data regardless of its location. It also offers features like shared links, built-in media viewers, and theming.
key_features: Sleek, Speedy, Snappy UI
Extensible via plugins and a Workflow engine
Shared Links with network drive mounting
SFTP and S3 access through third-party tools
Builtin Music, Video, Image viewers with transcoding and Chromecast support
API and LLM integration via MCP
Themes replicating popular UX designs
primary_use_case: Centralized file management across multiple storage backends.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled librarian stands amidst towering shelves representing various storage systems (FTP, S3, WebDAV). The librarian uses a universal interface, a glowing tablet displaying the Filestash logo, to seamlessly access and organize files across all shelves. Digital threads connect the tablet to each shelf, visualizing the unified access. A user smiles as they easily retrieve a file from a previously inaccessible location. The scene is set in a bright, modern library with a clean and organized aesthetic. Small UI elements on the tablet show file previews and management options. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors.
